message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a competitive price of $14,000. This offer stands for a limited time, so don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. This is my best offer, and I'm ready to close the deal if you accept.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,750. This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,750 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. I'm willing to go up to $10,500. This is my final offer, let's close this deal.
